dict.acceptation: 收集；聚集，搜集；收紧，收缩；采集；

sent.orig: Collective communication includes many kinds of global communication, such as Broadcast, Barrier, Reduce, Scatter, Gather etc.
sent.trans: 聚合通信包括很多全局操作，比如广播通信(Broadcast),同步(Barrier)、全局归约(Reduce),散布(Scatter)、聚集(gather)等等。

sent.orig: For of thorns men do not gather figs, nor of a bramble bush gather they grapes.
sent.trans: 人不是从荆棘上摘无花果、也不是从蒺？里摘葡萄。

sent.orig: Why collectivity is integral, rational number can form gather, is gather those who there is determinism?
sent.trans: 为什么全体整数，有理数可以构成集合，集合不是有确定性的吗？

sent.orig: Now, as farmers rush to gather in a bin-busting harvest, their fortunes have improved.
sent.trans: 今年年成不错，农场主们正在抢收庄稼，他们的运气也有好转。

sent.orig: To pleat or gather (fabric) into a ruffle.
sent.trans: 给（织物）打褶裥，给（织物）饰褶边。
